price: Hakika Sisi tuliwapelekea upepo wa kimbunga katika siku korofi mfululizo,
arabic: إِنَّآ أَرۡسَلۡنَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ رِيحٗا صَرۡصَرٗا فِي يَوۡمِ نَحۡسٖ مُّسۡتَمِرّٖ
footnotes: Sisi kwa yakini tuliwapatiliza kwa upepo ubaridi unao vuma, katika siku ya ukorofi wa daima,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innā arsalnā ʿalayhim rīḥan ṣarṣaran fī yawmi naḥsin mus'tamirrin
